Updated to V1.4

CheckRoot : Use PrintWriter instead of OutputStream
-->Better to use a Character based stream instead of a byte based one
Run each check on a different thread (1/2)
CheckRoot : Implement Runnable instead of extending Thread
Run each check on a different thread (2/2)
Ensure that the CheckRoot thread finishes last
MainActivity.about_app() : Use StringBuilder
Shift device detection to Utils.MiscFunctions class
Move PlayStore rating mechanism to Utils.Rating class
Code cleanup
CheckRoot : Close the Scanner object
Un-derp CheckRoot checking logic
Update GPL License headers

Use a single background drawable for all screen resolutions
-->Achieved by dynamically resizing the background drawable as per the device's resolution
Get bg drawable's resolution at run time instead of hard coding
